author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Under the Biden Administration, at least 8.5 million “undocumented” aliens arrived at the Southern Border. The left would like it if all these people were afforded lengthy court proceedings, despite that not being possible. This is why Byron Donalds said what needed to be said.


Byron Donalds with an absolute takedown of the Main stream media narrative that illegal immigrants deserve “due process” pic.twitter.com/ShD2NNlbsY
— CartierFamily (@cartierfamilyZ) May 6, 2025


You really cannot sum it up better th
title: Byron Donalds Schools NBC About Due Process After Reporter Tries To Corner Him On Illegals

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Even if the left must adhere to the notion that no human is illegal, why must some of them defend some of the scummiest people on earth? That is something they will never understand, as they blindly defend the “undocumented” without a thought as to who they are protecting.

A Brazilian migrant ran away to the United States in 2016 after being convicted of child rape. He was just found hiding out at a Massachusetts daycare.

BREAKING: Cape Cod daycare busted for hiding an illegal alien who ran away from Brazil’s court after he rped a 13 year old pic.twitter.com/9UomDW3T7m
— End Wokeness (@EndWokeness) May 6, 2025
title: Massachusetts daycare busted for harboring illegal immigrant... on the run from sexually assaulting a 13-year-old

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
If the left claims to be all in it for the little guy, just trying to make ends meet, why do they enact policies that make it so extremely difficult for the working class to thrive? That is something Progressives can never answer, as their Utopias have subsequently made it so that six figures are now considered low income, at least for several California Bay Area counties.

California Bay Area counties now consider low income to be 6 figureshttps://t.co/aUbswgwD9a
— The Post Millennial (@TPostMillennial) May 6, 2025


Acc
title: Congrats! If you only make six-figures in this Democrat run state, you are now considered LOW INCOME

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
How has immigration changed in America over the past 200 years? Today’s show breaks down why illegal aliens are nothing like immigrants in the past.

"The biggest difference is pre-welfare state vs post-welfare state," Crowder said. “Today they come here with the promise of everything.”

People used to come here with no promise of anything but the “land of opportunity.”

“Back in the day, people came here to risk--to be entrepreneurs. Today, they come to take. [This is] a very different dynamic.”

Additionally, Americans used to share many t
title: Watch: Multicultural Immigration Has No Place in America & Must Be Stopped

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
A viral video of woke author Elie Mystal is making the rounds on social media after he claimed that if an illegal alien killed him, he wants his kids to know he would not care about their immigration status.

Elie Mystal: "If I get kiIIed by an illegal, I beg you to tell my kids I did not care about his status" pic.twitter.com/q2RPk9Cckn
— End Wokeness (@EndWokeness) May 5, 2025


The major point as to why this is incredibly asinine is that had the criminal alien not been able to break federal immigration laws, the fictitio
title: Woke author has a message to his kids if he's ever killed by an illegal: “I did not care ...”

author: Brodigan
description:
Ilhan Omar is going viral and, can you believe it, we’ve never done a What a Piece of Sh*t. Here it is in all its glory. The Trump administration announced it will pay illegals $1k to self-deport. Let’s crunch some numbers. Immigration has changed in America over the last 250 years. We take a look at immigration through the course of American history and why the illegals who come in now are not the same as the immigrants who came in the past.

ILHAN OMAR: WHAT A PIECE OF SH*T
title: Sources: Multicultural Immigration Has No Place in America & Must Be Stopped

description:
General rule of thumb. Before you get upset over whatever silly thing Donald Trump (or the Trump Admin) says or does on social media, count to ten and wait until the overreaction to said silly thing. It makes your content viewing experience that much more enjoyable, especially when Trump responds to a reporter who treats the outrage as if it's the most pressing issue facing all the United States of the Americas today.

At issue is this post from the White House looking to influence the College of Cardinals as they kibitz over who the next Pope should be.

pic.twitter.com/x2HrR939tn
— The White House (@WhiteHouse) May 3, 2025
title: Trump DROPS reporter over dumb question about Pope photoshop (though not as hard as JD Vance drops a Never Trumper)
